mapper.select: SELECT re.emp_no, re.rep_date,re.board_no, hd.dept_name, hp.pos_name,hr.role_name, re.rep_content,re.rep_no,em.emp_name FROM hr_reply re JOIN hr_employees em ON re.emp_nO=em.emp_no JOIN hr_department hd ON em.dept_code =hd.dept_code JOIN hr_position hp ON em.pos_code=hp.pos_code JOIN hr_role hr ON hr.role_code =em.role_code WHERE re.board_no=#{boardNo} ORDER BY 2 desc LIMIT #{page.pageLimitNum}, #{page.boardAmount}
SELECT rep_no, rep_content, rep_date, board_no,emp_no FROM hr_reply WHERE rep_no = #{repNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hr_reply (rep_content, board_no, emp_no) VALUES (#{repContent},#{boardNo},#{empNo})
